snippet: At the murky intersection of texting, driving and the law.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author Anthony DePalma describes how woman responsible for fatal car accident that resulted in his brother's death was not criminally indicted due to unreasonable standard of evidence for determining whether her texting led to crash; suggests California investigation into accident involving Bruce Jenner may run into similar issues.
lead_paragraph: At the murky intersection of texting, driving and the law.

headline.print_headline: Did a Text Kill My Brother?
headline.main: Did a Text Kill My Brother?
